segments.text: How can I lose weight , doctor ? I seem to get fatter even when I just look at food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Jim . It is a combination of how much you eat , the type of food you eat , and when you eat your meals .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a big mistake , you should always have a good breakfast . You will not run your car without fuel , and yet you won't expect your body to work without food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I never thought about it that way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bet you eat a large evening meal , then sit and watch TV or read a book . Then instead of burning off your energy , your body stores it as fat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh doctor , I feel so foolish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well control is really using common sense when you plan your eating habits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know doctor , thank you so much .
segments.speaker: S1
